content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "diamond_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "crimson_fungus", "quantity": 31, "index": 14}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "light_weighted_pressure_plate", "quantity": 64, "index": 31}, {"type": "turtle_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 36}]
thought: To craft lime_stained_glass, I need to place 8 glass in a row and 1 lime_dye in the middle. There are 8 glass in slot 36 so I will start by moving one of them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1
